com.heaven7.java.game.base.state

类 DefaultStateMachine<E extends StateMachineSupplier<E>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.heaven7.java.game.base.state.DefaultStateMachine<E>
  • 类型参数:
    E - the entity which implements StateMachineSupplier.
    所有已实现的接口:
    StateMachine<E>
    直接已知子类:
    StackStateMachine

    public class DefaultStateMachine<E extends StateMachineSupplier<E>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements StateMachine<E>
    this is a default implements of StateMachine}.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      The current state the owner is in.
      protected int mGlobalState
      The global state of the owner.

        protected int mPreviousState
        The last state the owner was in.

      • mGlobalState

        protected int mGlobalState
        The global state of the owner. Its logic is called every time the FSM is updated.

      • revertToPreviousState

        public boolean revertToPreviousState()
        从接口复制的说明: StateMachine
        Change state back to the previous state.
        指定者:
        revertToPreviousState 在接口中 StateMachine<E extends StateMachineSupplier<E>>
        返回:
        True in case there was a previous state that we were able to revert to. In case there is no previous state, no state change occurs and false will be returned.

      • isInState

        public boolean isInState(int states)
        从接口复制的说明: StateMachine
        Indicates whether the state machine is in the given state.

        This implementation assumes states are singletons (typically an enum) so they are compared with the == operator instead of the equals method.

        指定者:
        isInState 在接口中 StateMachine<E extends StateMachineSupplier<E>>
        参数:
        states - the state to be compared with the current state
        返回:
        true if the current state and the given state are the same object.
